mapper.insert: INSERT ignore INTO successkilled(seckillId, userPhone, createTime) VALUES (#{seckillId}, #{userPhone}, #{nowTime});
mapper.select: -- 根据id查询成功明细并携带seckill实体 -- 灵活使用mybatis SELECT sk.*, s.seckillId "seckill.seckillId", s.name "seckill.name", s.number "seckill.number", s.start "seckill.start", s.end "seckill.end", s.createTime "seckill.createTime" FROM successkilled sk INNER JOIN seckill s ON s.seckillId = sk.seckillId WHERE sk.seckillId = #{seckillId} AND userPhone = #{userPhone};
